channel.title: html on Go 中文档集
channel.description: Recent content in html on Go 中文档集

item.title: html
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/html@go1.24.2 Package html provides functions for escaping and unescaping HTML text. ​ html包提供了用于转义和反转义HTML文本的函

item.title: template
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/html/template@go1.24.2 GO-2023-1703: Templates do not properly consider backticks (`) as Javascript string delimiters, and do not escape them as expected. Backticks are used, since ES6, for JS
